thread.title: BREAKING: Trump Retaliates After Iran Fires Missile…
thread.title_full: BREAKING: Trump Retaliates After Iran Fires Missile…

author: Andrew Mark Miller
title: BREAKING: Trump Retaliates After Iran Fires Missile…
text:
It is well understood that President Obama made Iran stronger during his time in office. 
When he showed up, the Iranian economy was in shambles and the country was relatively in check as much as regime led by a crazy homicidal maniac could be. 
Now that Obama is gone, Iran is off the rails with a growing economy, more money to spend on terror, and a ridiculous nuclear deal that paves the way to a bomb. 
On top of all that, Iran has been picking fights with the United States and making our lives miserable wherever they can. 
They’ve also violated Obama’s deal a handful of times. 
There is some good news, however. 
Donald Trump is going to be about a million times tougher on Iran than Obama was. 
He’s already imposing sanctions on the Iranians. 
From Washington Examiner : 
President Trump imposed sanctions against Iran on Friday in retaliation for the country’s decision to test a ballistic missile over the weekend in violation of a United Nations resolution. 
The sanctions apply to 13 people and 12 companies in Iran, according to the Treasury Department, which unveiled the measures Friday morning. 
Senior administration officials said the sanctions were a result of “careful consideration” after repeated incidents of support for terrorism and weapons testing. The National Security Council debated how to implement the measures and “sought approval from the president,” officials said. 
Good. 
It’s about time someone stands up to Iran for a change. 
Check out this great sound bite from earlier this week. 
Big league.
